Name: Pineapple Fizz
Ingredients: 50 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
12.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple or lime wedge.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass whilst also pouring soda.
Garnish with pineapple or lime wedge on rim.
Review: A Pineapple Daiquiri lengthened with soda. You'll be surprised just how tasty and refreshing this drink is.
Nutrition: One serving of Pineapple Fizz contains 168 calories
